additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Wheat Flour, Water, Butter (20%) (Cream), Sugar, Yeast, Iodised Salt, Wheat Gluten, Buttermilk Powder, Improver (Wheat Flour, Mineral Salt (Calcium Carbonate), Vegetable Emulsifiers (471, 472e), Thickeners (412, 415)), Barley Malt Flour.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present SOY, May Be Present SESAME, May Be Present TREE NUTS, May Be Present EGG, May Be Present PEANUTS

description: Bake in the oven for a delicious golden flaky finish
name: All Butter Mini Croissants 8 Pack
